summary: A request from another Nexus Member
descriptionHtml:
a while ago i created a mod using my own family coat of arms to re-skin Whiteruns guards (found below)

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2722

and agreed to take requests for others to send me a link to their family crests which i would then use to re-skin guards of a city they choose. this is the guards of Solitude re-skinned to carry the crest of the Bauer Family submitted by dokkka.

again and as always, any requests are welcome as i really enjoy texture meddling :)

hope you enjoy the mod which will hopefully evolve into a large project incorporating many different families.

Callaghan04
author: Callaghan04
